note:
I'm a father of a small naturist family with one son. For us naturism is much more than just being nude, for us the core value of naturism is respect.

Respect for everyone an everything, so everything we do and everything we buy is with that in mind. Being naked simply makes it easier for everybody to be mutual respectful as there is no status symbol, like expensive watches or branded clothing.

NFN/INF member, pronouns: he/him, joined the fedivers on July 2019.
